description: This file defines a Flutter widget named PaddleIcon that displays a pickleball paddle icon using CustomPainter. It includes the PaddleIcon class and a private _PaddlePainter class responsible for drawing the paddle and decorative elements.

classes.name: PaddleIcon
classes.description: A Flutter widget that displays a pickleball paddle icon with customizable size and color.

classes.name: _PaddlePainter
classes.description: A custom painter that draws the paddle icon, including the head, handle, and decorative ball.

methods.name: PaddleIcon
methods.description: Constructor for the PaddleIcon widget, allowing optional size and color parameters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget that paints the paddle icon using CustomPaint.

methods.name: _PaddlePainter
methods.description: Constructor for the _PaddlePainter class, initializing with a specific color.

methods.name: paint
methods.description: Contains the custom drawing instructions for rendering the paddle illustration.

methods.name: shouldRepaint
methods.description: Determines whether repainting is necessary when the painter's state changes.
